content: Save the file copy in the original format as well

comment.text: Save file copy in original format. This text is used as a confirmation message when a user decides to save a file copy that maintains its original formatting. It appears on a dialog box within the file management section of the profile settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "احفظ نسخة الملف بالتنسيق الأصلي أيضًا" while generally conveying the meaning, can be improved for naturalness in Arabic. "بالتنسيق الأصلي" (in the original format) sounds somewhat technical and formal. A more natural phrasing would emphasize saving a copy *as* the original.

The translation "Faylın nüsxəsini orijinal formatda da yadda saxla" doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of "Save the file copy in the original format as well". While understandable, it's a bit verbose and not as concise as the English original. A more natural-sounding translation would be closer to "Saxla faylın nüsxəsini orijinal formatda".

The translation 'Запази копието на файла и в оригиналния формат' while generally correct, could be more precise. 'Save the file copy in the original format as well' implies saving *in addition* to other formats, while the translation doesn't fully convey that 'as well' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Запази копието на файла и в оригиналния формат също

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Save the file copy in the original format as well" implies preserving the original format *while* creating a copy. The German translation "Dateikopie auch im Originalformat speichern" simply means 'Save the file copy in the original format.'  It lacks the 'as well' implication. A better translation would incorporate the simultaneous action.

The translation 'Αποθηκεύστε το αντίγραφο του αρχείου και στην αρχική μορφή' while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of "Save the file copy in the original format as well". The 'as well' implies an addition to an existing save action. The current translation feels more like a general instruction. A more accurate translation might include an indicator of addition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αποθηκεύστε το αντίγραφο του αρχείου και στην αρχική μορφή επίσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Save the file copy in the original format as well' implies an action being performed in addition to a previous action. 'Sauvegarder également la copie du fichier dans le format original' is a direct translation but loses some of that implied additional action. A more natural French phrasing might better reflect the original meaning. For example, 'Conserver également une copie du fichier au format original' or 'Enregistrer aussi une copie du fichier au format original'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Conserver également une copie du fichier au format original' or 'Enregistrer aussi une copie du fichier au format original'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "コピーしたファイルをオリジナルの形式にも保存する" while understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of "Save the file copy in the original format as well." It focuses on saving the copy, but the English emphasizes preserving the *original format* during the saving process. The Japanese could be interpreted as simply saving a copy, regardless of the original format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コピーしたファイルを、オリジナルの形式で保存する

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '파일 복사본을 원본 형식으로도 저장' is too literal and sounds awkward in Korean. While technically correct, it's not how a native speaker would phrase this. A more natural translation would convey the idea of preserving the original format during the copy process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 파일 복사 시 원본 형식으로 저장

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ບັນທຶກໄຟລ໌ສຳເນົາໄວ້ໃນຮູບແບບຕົ້ນສະບັບເຊັ່ນດຽວກັນ' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow. 'ເຊັ່ນດຽວກັນ' (as well) is redundant given the context. The phrase could be more concise and readable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບັນທຶກໄຟລ໌ສຳເນົາໄວ້ໃນຮູບແບບຕົ້ນສະບັບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Guardar a cópia do ficheiro também no formato original" is a bit literal and doesn't flow as naturally in Portuguese. "Save the file copy in the original format as well" implies preserving the original file format *during* the copy process. A more natural phrasing would convey that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Salvar uma cópia do ficheiro no formato original" or "Salvar uma cópia do ficheiro mantendo o formato original".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Salvează copia și în formatul original' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Save the file copy in the original format as well'. It's missing the 'as well' aspect, implying it's in addition to another format. A better translation would include the idea of 'also' or 'too'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salvează copia și în formatul original, de asemenea

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "මුල් ආකෘතියෙන් ද ගොනුවේ පිටපතක් සුරකින්න" while conveying the general idea, isn't a direct or natural translation of "Save the file copy in the original format as well". A more precise translation would emphasize that the copy *should* be saved in the original format.

The English phrase 'Save the file copy in the original format as well' implies saving a copy in the same format as the original file. The Slovenian translation 'Kopijo datoteke shranite tudi v izvirni obliki' translates more literally to 'Save the file copy also in the original form'. While not entirely incorrect, it lacks the nuance of preserving the original format. A better translation would convey the idea of keeping the format identical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kopijo datoteke shranite tudi v enakem formatu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Сачувај копију датотеке у оригиналном формату такође" is a literal translation and sounds somewhat unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be "Сачувај копију датотеке у оригиналном формату."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сачувај копију датотеке у оригиналном формату.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'takođe' can be improved for a more natural flow. While technically correct, it feels slightly awkward in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sačuvaj kopiju datoteke u originalnom formatu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dosya kopyasını da orijinal türünde kaydet' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Save the file copy in the original format as well'. 'Orijinal türünde' refers to format, but it's slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might emphasize preserving the original file type.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dosya kopyasını da orijinal formatında kaydet

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lưu cả bản sao của tệp ở định dạng gốc' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Save the file copy in the original format as well.' The 'as well' implies an addition to a previous action, which isn't reflected in the Vietnamese translation. It sounds like a standalone instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lưu cả bản sao của tệp ở định dạng gốc, ngoài ra.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "以原始格式保存文件副本" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Save the file copy in the original format as well". It misses the nuance of 'as well' implying it's an additional option or setting. A better translation would include a phrase conveying that it's in addition to another action or setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 以原始格式保存文件副本，同时保留原始格式。
